# WorldSync: Global Timezone & Metrics Conversion PWA

## Project Overview
A progressive web application built with Nuxt.js for timezone conversion with daylight savings awareness and metrics conversion. Features an intuitive swap toggle for quick timezone switching.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Nuxt.js (Vue 3)
- **Type**: Progressive Web App (PWA)
- **Features**: Timezone conversion, Daylight Savings Time support, Metrics conversion, Swap toggle UI

## Setup Progress

- [ ] Verify Nuxt.js project setup
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Configure PWA plugin
- [ ] Create timezone and metrics conversion utilities
- [ ] Build core UI components (timezone picker, swap toggle, metrics converter)
- [ ] Add daylight savings logic
- [ ] Setup service worker and manifest
- [ ] Test and launch dev server

## Development Guidelines
- Use Nuxt 3+ features (composables, auto-imports)
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Use proper TypeScript where applicable
- Follow Vue 3 Composition API pattern
- Ensure all timezone logic accounts for DST
